DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and effectiveness of tacrolimus inhalation aerosol in subjects with persistent asthma.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Tacrolimus Inhalation Aerosol in Subjects With Persistent Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group, multi-center designed trial is to determine the safety and efficacy of tacrolimus inhalation aerosol in subjects with persistent asthma.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of persistent asthma for at least 6 months Require use of betaagonists at least four times per week Diagnosis of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)
